USB Definitions
USB Device
Collaboration diagram for USB Definitions:

Detailed Description

Macros

#define usb_declare_string(len)
 
#define usb_assign_string(len,...)
 

Macro Definition Documentation

#define usb_assign_string (   len,
  ... 
)

This macro function allows the user to assign values to a USB string using comma separated characters.

Parameters
lenThe number of characters in the string.
...Comma separated characters (e.g. 'E','x','a','m','p','l','e')
#define usb_declare_string (   len)

This macro function allows the user to declare a USB string data structure.
